suite.name: Avenuecode Automation

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Given that the user is logged in to the ToDo App
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: When the user clicks on the "My Tasks" link on the NavBar
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Then the user is redirected to a page with all the created tasks so far
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: And the user sees a message on the top part saying that list belongs to the logged user
Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.
kw.msg: Current page contains element '//a[contains(.,'Welcome, Victor Hugo Fonseca!')]'.

kw.name: And the user creates a new task with at least three characters
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.arg: text=This is an automated test description
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'This is an automated test description' into text field 'id=new_task'.

kw.name: And the user adds the task to the list
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And the new task is appended to the list of created tasks
Page Should Contain Element
kw.arg: locator=//td[contains(.,'This is an automated test description')]
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.
kw.msg: Current page contains element '//td[contains(.,'This is an automated test description')]'.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: And the user clicks on the "Manage Subtasks" button
Click Button
kw.arg: locator=//button[@class='btn btn-xs btn-primary ng-binding'][contains(.,'(0) Manage Subtasks')]
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking button '//button[@class='btn btn-xs btn-primary ng-binding'][contains(.,'(0) Manage Subtasks')]'.

kw.name: Then the user should see a popup dialog with the task ID and task description
Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: And the user should see a form to enter SubTask Description and Due Date
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: When the user enters a valid SubTask Description and Due Date
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.arg: text=This is an automated test subtask description
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And the user clicks the "Add SubTask" button
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then the user should see the SubTask appended to the bottom of the modal dialog
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
kw.msg: Element '//h4[contains(.,'SubTasks of this ToDo:')]' is displayed.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.arg: locator=//a[@editable-text='sub_task.body'][contains(.,'This is an automated test subtask description')]
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
kw.msg: Element '//a[@editable-text='sub_task.body'][contains(.,'This is an automated test subtask description')]' is displayed.

kw.name: And the user should see the number of SubTasks updated on the "Manage Subtasks" button
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.arg: locator=//button[@class='btn btn-xs btn-primary ng-binding'][contains(.,'(1) Manage Subtasks')]
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
kw.msg: Element '//button[@class='btn btn-xs btn-primary ng-binding'][contains(.,'(1) Manage Subtasks')]' is displayed.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.arg: text=Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Quisque eleifend sem nulla, in gravida ipsum sagittis at. In tincidunt gravida nisi, interdum elementum diam. Pellentesque viverra tincidunt mollis. Nulla consequat, mi vel interdum malesuada123456

kw.msg: Typing text 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Quisque eleifend sem nulla, in gravida ipsum sagittis at. In tincidunt gravida nisi, interdum elementum diam.
